title: Fracking Boom Town Wary Of Pastor's 'Overnighters'
teaser: Jesse Moss tells NPR's Scott Simon about his documentary, The Overnighters. It follows a pastor in a North Dakota oil boom town whose life is upended when he opens the church to down-and-out workers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
